items.title: Review – Shelby Oaks (2025) hints at something different, but can’t keep its promises
bullets: • Shelby Oaks is a muddled, uneven experiment that never quite figures out what it wants to be
• It swings between cinematic sequences, faux-documentary interviews, and found-footage snippets with little sense of cohesion
• What starts as a promising premise erodes into a greatest-hits compilation of genre clichés

• Lightning has proven more elusive on our closest planetary neighbors

items.title: The origins of your dog's unique look may be older than you think

• The study was published in the journal Science
• It's commonly believed that this vast range in physical attributes is a product of the Victorian era

items.title: Italy's Campi Flegrei supervolcano is stirring. Could this seismic giant soon erupt?
bullets: • Italy's Campi Flegrei supervolcano is stirring again, shaking the ground in a way that scientists say it hasn't for centuries
• Two of the most recent earthquakes are the strongest we've ever seen, scientist says
• Over half a million people would have to be evacuated from an area that authorities have marked the "red zone" around the volcano's crater

items.title: Fever helps the body fight off viruses: But how does it work?

• Today, researchers understand that fever is part of the immune system's response to a pathogen
• But how they can help kick an infection remains mysterious

• The find reinforces Africa as the center of early Dyrosaurid evolution
• The study was published in The Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society

items.title: Ticket prices increased 5% in Q3 vs. 2024
